communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Any and all written records (including but not limited to hard-copy documents, memos, reports, emails, word processor documents, PDF documents, PowerPoint files, etc.) created, received, FWDed, CCed, or BCCed by members of the Niles police department and other village of Niles department staff, including elected public officials, between January 1, 2017 and the date this request is processed (inclusive of those dates) regarding Carol Johnson.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Niles Coalition

title: Request for Complaints against Donald J Trump

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Request for Complaints against Donald J Trump
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to request access to any and all complaints filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) regarding Donald J Trump during his time as a public figure and/or businessperson, on a rolling basis.

Specifically, I am seeking any complaints, filings, or other communications received by the SEC that reference Donald J Trump, his businesses, or his associates. This may include complaints related to securities fraud, insider trading, or any other area over which the SEC has jurisdiction.

I would like to request information on any companies owned or controlled by Donald J Trump, including but not limited to the Trump Organization, Trump Foundation, and Trump International Hotels. Please include any and all relevant communications, documents, or other materials related to complaints filed against these entities or their representatives.

To support my request, I would like to cite several relevant court cases, including SEC v. Trump, 279 F. Supp. 2d 340 (S.D.N.Y. 2003), SEC v. Trump, 2020 WL 4044162 (S.D.N.Y. July 17, 2020), and SEC v. Trump, 2021 WL 1520177 (S.D.N.Y. April 19, 2021). These cases demonstrate the importance of transparency and accountability in the securities industry, and underscore the need for disclosure of relevant complaints and information.

Additionally, I would like to provide notice that any withholding or deletion of responsive records without a lawful basis will result in my pursuit of legal action and complaint to the appropriate authorities. As you are aware, FOIA requires agencies to disclose all non-exempt records in response to a request within a reasonable time frame, and any failure to do so would constitute a violation of the law.

Please provide any responsive records to this request on a rolling basis, as they become available.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Good Citizen

title: Request for Complaints about Donald J Trump

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Request for Complaints about Donald J Trump
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to update my previous request for access to any and all complaints filed with the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) regarding Donald J Trump during his time as a public figure and/or elected official.

As a supplement to my original request, I would like to cite a relevant court case, Cause of Action v. FTC, No. 13-0124 (D.D.C. 2014), which affirmed the importance of disclosing responsive records in accordance with the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) in a timely and transparent manner.

Furthermore, I would like to provide notice that any withholding or deletion of responsive records without a lawful basis will result in my pursuit of legal action and complaint to the appropriate authorities. As you are aware, FOIA requires agencies to disclose all non-exempt records in response to a request within a reasonable time frame, and any failure to do so would constitute a violation of the law.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Good Citizen

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Casefile: Excited Delirium 1980s
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting the complete case file on all deaths from January 1, 1981 to December 31, 1989 that contain "excited delirium" or "cocaine toxicity" or "cocaine intoxication" as a cause of death.  

I am requesting scanned PDF copies of the complete case files including: 
investigation report / scene investigation report
any hand written case information notes 
notes of the classification of pending case
the classification of pending case page (which lists cause of death / manner of death, how incident occurred and the rationale for classification)
the autopsy report
the cause of death page 
the complete toxicology report with results
the medical examiner's cover sheet describing date, location, age, address cause of death, and other preliminary findings

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Deanna W
